stories.original_headline: Scientists found a way to help aging guts heal themselves
stories.original_summary: Researchers have discovered a way to help aging intestines heal themselves using CAR T-cell therapy. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Potion to Heal Aging Bellies!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a remarkable new elixir. This potion can help the innards of even the oldest folk repair themselves. It banishes the lingering shadows that cause discomfort, allowing bellies to feel spry and absorb more nourishment, just as it did for little critters in their studies.

stories.original_headline: This ancient fossil could rewrite the story of human origins
stories.original_summary: Scientists may have cracked the case of whether a seven-million-year-old fossil could walk upright. stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Relic May Change Tales of Humankind's First Steps!
stories.fantasy_story: Scholars of Lore have unearthed an ancient set of bones, seven million winters old, that challenges what we know of our ancestors. It seems this creature, though ape-like, could stride on two feet just like modern folk. This discovery might rewrite the very first chapters of humankind's story.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Scroll of Hornet's Journey Wins Grand Scroll Awards!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Scroll Scribes Guild has declared the winners of their annual accolades. Unsurprisingly, 'The Scroll of Hornet's Journey' has been crowned Most Entertaining Scroll of the Year! It also received the title of 'Most Challenging Scroll,' which many players can surely attest to after countless attempts.
